entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
